metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4379 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found in __nfs42_ssc_open() infs/nfs/nfs4file.c in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows an attacker toconduct a remote denial

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
